name: L.S.
description:
Hello, and thank You for downloading demo of my horror game :3

The footsteps are taken from

and are here as a placeholder.

The creek sound is taken from http://jvunity.com/ and is here as a placeholder.

The ambient music is taken from

and also is a placeholder.

All of the models that You see in-game are created by me using prefab creator provided by unity.

Huge thanks to Jimmy Vegas https://www.youtube.com/c/JimmyVegasUnity/featured

 for creating awesome tutorial series <3

And again thank You Player for trying my little project out :D

Have a good day

~Rendzio

P.S.

In terms of the game concept, I was really amazed by what "Lost in Vivo" was able to achieve with limited graphics

and cast, it is a huge inspiration for me.

After entering the shed there will be P.T. inspired stairwell that leads to underground facility a'la SCP site.

Main scare factor is supposed to be fear of being watched, and liminal space motive (therefore the name L.S.).

Gameplay is going to be a first person adventure game (like with the first "puzzle" where the player needs to find an object to use it and progress).

I don't think I will be adding guns or real enemies that can actually hurt You, however I am still not convinced on that 100%.

I hope puzzles will be enough to keep interest in progressing, well that and determination to save Your Teddy Bear that was kidnapped by a man at the end.

If You have any ideas/suggestions I am open to them, and will probably share with You where the game is at the moment

Contact me via Discord - Rendzio#6446
